statements.select:
WITH CTE (ID, Level, HierID) AS ( SELECT AA.ID as ID , 1 AS Level , CAST(RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SortOrder, AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) as HierID FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapSite AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND AA.ID = #ParentID#
AND AA.ParentID IS NULL
UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID as ID , BB.Level + 1 as Level , CAST(BB.HierID+ '-' + RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SortOrder, AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HierID FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapSite AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CTE BB ON AA.ParentID = BB.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BB.HierID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, BB.HierID , REPLICATE(' ', (BB.Level -1) * 5) + CASE WHEN BB.Level = 1 THEN '▷ ' ELSE '▶ ' END + AA.Name as HierName , BB.Level
, AA.Name , AA.Url , AA.ParentID , AA.Description , AA.UseYn , AA.SortOrder FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapSite AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CTE BB on AA.ID = BB.ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TScrapSite AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TScrapSite ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, ParentID, Url, SortOrder, UseYn, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #ParentID#, #Url#, #SortOrder#, #UseYn#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TScrapSite SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , ParentID = #ParentID# , Url = #Url# , SortOrder = #SortOrder# , UseYn = #UseYn# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
